name: Samantha Jones
coverLetter:
Hi,
I have experience in positions and areas that have required a great attention to detail. I am really good at meticulous tasks and have done jewelry making with seed beads, pattern making and merchandising. Although these skills are not directly related, I believe that they have equipped and enabled me to have confidence that I could trim weed well. I am prompt, dependable, and trustworthy. I hope that you will be fortunate enough to see my value as an employee.
